Spiral Review

  1. Simplify.

    • \(a. 5 × 6\)
    • \(b. 5 × 60\)
    • \(c. 5 × 600\)

  2. Write the prime factorization of 80.

  3. Find the volume of a rectangular prism with a length of 5 inches, a width of 7 inches, and a height of 4 inches.

  4. Are the expressions 3x + 15 and 3(x + 5) equivalent? Justify your answer.
